name: debauchee
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a debauched person (= one who drinks too much alcohol, takes drugs, shows bad sexual behaviour, etc.): He gave a convincing stage performance as the unpleasant young debauchee. He was condemned as a 'scandalous debauchee'. See
debauched
More examplesFewer examplesI live in Washington, where if you have more than two glasses of white wine, you're considered a debauchee.Her son is a drunken young debauchee. Owen is a debauchee with a fondness for sexual adventure.
